nodes.text: The Galan starfighter was a sleek, small two-seater starfighter used by the Galacians.
In 44 BBY, Queen Veda of Gala loaned one of the starfighters to Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn and his Padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi, who would pilot it during the Mission to Melida/Daan.
More than seventeen years later, a Galan starfighter was used by Obi-Wan Kenobi and his apprentice Anakin Skywalker on their assignments to Euceron and Haariden.
